DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the clinical performance on Analgesia/Nociception Index (ANI) in the assessment of immediate postoperative analgesia in PACU in adult patients undergoing general anesthesia.
DOC.brief_title: Non-invasive Assessment of Immediate Postoperative Analgesia Using Analgesia/Nociception Index (ANI)
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluation of the relationship between ANI and numerical rating pain scale (NRS) by linear regression. Assessment of the performance of ANI to detect NRS>3 and NRS>=7 by building ROC curves.
DOC.criteria: adult surgical or endoscopic procedures performed on general anesthesia age <18 yrs or >75 yrs arrythmia administration of anticholinergic drugs or neuromuscular blockade reversal in the 20 previous minutes psychiatric diseases autonomic nervous system (ANS) disorders inability to understand the verbal rating pain scale.
